Effective: January 1, 2025

Last updated: November 18, 2024

Introduction

Welcome to PhotexAI! By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms & Conditions. This document outlines the terms of use, your rights, and your obligations while interacting with our platform. Please read these terms carefully, as they contain important information about your use of our services and your legal rights. If you do not agree to these terms, you must not use our services.

User Account Responsibilities

To access our services, users must create an account. During the registration process, users agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information. Users are responsible for updating their account details to ensure that the information remains accurate.

Users must maintain the confidentiality of their account credentials, including their username and password. It is essential to take adequate precautions to safeguard these details, such as using strong, unique passwords and not sharing login information with others. Users are solely responsible for all activities conducted under their account, whether or not they have authorized such activities.

PhotexAI will not be held liable for any loss or damage arising from a failure to comply with these obligations. If unauthorized access or any security breach is detected, users must notify PhotexAI promptly at press@photexai.com. PhotexAI reserves the right to suspend or terminate an account if it determines that unauthorized activity has occurred or if users violate the Terms & Conditions.

Eligibility

PhotexAIâ€™s services are available to users of all ages and from any location. By creating an account, users confirm they have the legal capacity to enter into binding agreements. Users under 18 should use the platform with parental or guardian supervision to ensure responsible use and adherence to safety practices. Users are responsible for complying with their local laws when accessing PhotexAI, as we make no guarantee of service appropriateness in all regions. If eligibility terms are violated or false information is provided, PhotexAI reserves the right to suspend or terminate access.

Spamming or Distributing Unsolicited Messages:

Users must refrain from sending mass, unsolicited, or repetitive communications to other users or external contacts through the platform. This includes commercial promotions, advertisements, or any form of spam that disrupts the normal user experience.

  • Uploading or Sharing Harmful Content: It is forbidden to upload, share, or disseminate content that is harmful, illegal, defamatory, abusive, or that infringes on the intellectual property or privacy rights of others. This includes any content that promotes violence, hate speech, harassment, or discrimination based on race, ethnicity, gender, religion, disability, or any other protected characteristic.
  • Disrupting Platform Security: Users must not engage in activities that threaten the integrity, performance, or security of the platform. This includes attempting to bypass security measures, deploying malware, or using any methods designed to disrupt the functionality of the platform, such as denial-of-service (DoS) attacks or other cyber threats.
  • Fraudulent or Deceptive Practices: Engaging in deceptive or fraudulent behavior, such as impersonating another person or entity, misrepresenting affiliations, or conducting scams, is strictly prohibited. Any attempt to manipulate or deceive other users or the platform for personal or financial gain is considered a serious violation.
  • Unauthorized Access and Misuse: Users must not attempt to gain unauthorized access to other users' accounts, data, or the underlying infrastructure of the platform. This includes circumventing access controls, exploiting vulnerabilities, or using automated scripts to extract data or engage with the platform.
  • Violation of Applicable Laws: All users must comply with relevant local, state, national, and international laws when using the platform. Any action that contravenes legal standards, whether through content or conduct, is not allowed.

License to Use

Users are granted a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, and revocable license to access and use the services provided by PhotexAI. This license allows users to interact with the platform and its features for personal use, and also for commercial purposes when participating in approved payment plans to sell their user-generated content, as permitted by PhotexAI's policies and guidelines. Users may not sell, rent, lease, or sublicense any aspect of the services provided.

This license does not grant users ownership of any intellectual property or content on the platform, including but not limited to software, design elements, logos, or proprietary data. Users are prohibited from modifying, copying, distributing, creating derivative works, reverse-engineering, or attempting to extract source code from any part of PhotexAIâ€™s services without explicit authorization.

The license may be revoked at PhotexAI's discretion, especially in cases where users are found to have violated the Terms & Conditions, engaged in prohibited conduct, or breached any agreements relating to their use of the platform. PhotexAI reserves the right to terminate or modify the terms of the license at any time, ensuring that users are notified of significant changes through the official platform communication channels.

By using PhotexAIâ€™s services, users agree to respect these terms and acknowledge that their access is contingent upon adherence to these conditions. Failure to comply with the terms of the license can result in restricted access or the suspension of user privileges.

Third-Party Services

While PhotexAI strives to maintain seamless integration with third-party services, users acknowledge that these services are subject to updates and changes beyond PhotexAIâ€™s control, which may impact functionality. Users are responsible for staying informed of these updates to ensure compliance and uninterrupted use of these features.

PhotexAI takes reasonable measures to securely integrate third-party tools but cannot be held liable for any data issues, disputes, or performance concerns arising from their use. By engaging with these services, users consent to the potential sharing of relevant usage data to facilitate functionality and improvements.

Disclaimers and Limitation of Liability

The services provided by PhotexAI are offered on an "as is" and "as available" basis, without any warranties, whether expressed or implied. This includes, but is not limited to, implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, non-infringement, or any warranty arising from a course of dealing or usage of trade. While PhotexAI strives to provide a reliable and secure service, it does not guarantee that the platform will be free from interruptions, security vulnerabilities, errors, or that any defects will be corrected promptly

Users acknowledge that they access and use PhotexAI's services at their own risk. PhotexAI is not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages that may result from the use of, or the inability to use, the platform. This includes, but is not limited to, damages for loss of data, revenue, profits, or other economic advantage, even if PhotexAI has been advised of the possibility of such damages. Furthermore, PhotexAI is not responsible for any harm caused by third-party services or integrations, including issues arising from the use of external tools such as Stable Diffusion by Stability AI.

PhotexAI disclaims any responsibility for service disruptions or failures beyond its reasonable control, such as those caused by technical issues, cyberattacks, or force majeure events. Users are advised to take necessary precautions, such as backing up data and ensuring robust security measures on their devices, to mitigate potential risks. The limitation of liability outlined here applies to the fullest extent permitted by law, ensuring users understand that the use of PhotexAI's services comes with inherent limitations and risks.

Termination Policy

PhotexAI reserves the right to suspend or terminate user accounts or restrict access at any time, with or without cause, and without prior notice, if a user violates these Terms & Conditions or engages in prohibited conduct. Such conduct includes fraudulent activities, unauthorized use, or actions compromising platform security or compliance.

Suspension or termination may result in the loss of access to associated data, and users are responsible for maintaining their own backups. While PhotexAI may offer an appeal process, it is not obligated to reinstate accounts or provide alternative solutions. Severe violations may lead to permanent bans from creating new accounts or accessing services.

Intellectual Property

All intellectual property rights related to the platform, including but not limited to software code, design elements, graphics, logos, content, and other proprietary materials, are owned exclusively by PhotexAI. These rights are protected under applicable copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. Users do not acquire any ownership rights or licenses to the intellectual property by using the platform, other than the limited license granted to access and use the services in accordance with these Terms & Conditions.

Unauthorized use, reproduction, distribution, modification, or creation of derivative works based on any part of PhotexAIâ€™s intellectual property is strictly prohibited without express written consent from PhotexAI. This includes scraping, reverse engineering, decompiling, or attempting to derive the source code or underlying ideas from any aspect of the platform. Any unauthorized action may result in the suspension or termination of user access and could lead to legal action.

Users are encouraged to respect the intellectual property rights of PhotexAI and other users. If users wish to reference or use any part of the platform for educational, journalistic, or other permissible purposes, they must seek prior permission from PhotexAI and provide appropriate acknowledgment where applicable. Violations of this policy undermine the security and integrity of the platform and will be dealt with according to the extent of the breach, ensuring protection of PhotexAIâ€™s proprietary assets.

Modifications to the Terms

PhotexAI reserves the right to modify, amend, or update these Terms & Conditions at any time to reflect changes in our services, legal requirements, or business practices. Any modifications will be effective immediately upon posting the revised version of our Usage Policy. Users are responsible for reviewing the Terms regularly to stay informed about any updates.

Notification of significant changes will be provided through prominent notices on the website or via other communication channels, such as email, to ensure users are aware of any revisions that may impact their use of the platform. Continued use of the services following the posting of modified Terms constitutes acceptance of those changes. If a user does not agree to the new terms, they must cease using the platform and may request the closure of their account.

PhotexAI aims to maintain transparency by providing users with clear and accessible updates regarding changes to the Terms & Conditions. This ensures that users are consistently aware of their rights and obligations when using the platform.

Dispute Resolution

Any disputes or claims arising out of or in connection with these Terms & Conditions, including issues relating to the use of the platform, user rights, or any breach of these terms, shall be resolved through binding arbitration or litigation, as deemed appropriate. This process ensures that both PhotexAI and the user engage in a fair and structured method of dispute resolution.

Binding arbitration will be conducted in accordance with the rules of a recognized arbitration institution, and the decision of the arbitrator shall be final and binding on both parties. Arbitration proceedings shall be held in a mutually agreed location, or otherwise determined by PhotexAI, and conducted in English. By agreeing to these Terms, users waive the right to pursue claims in a court of law or participate in class action lawsuits, except as prohibited by applicable law.

In cases where arbitration is not suitable or legally enforceable, litigation may proceed in the courts located in the jurisdiction stipulated under the "Governing Law" section. Both parties agree to submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of these courts for the resolution of any disputes not resolved by arbitration. PhotexAI strives to settle conflicts fairly and efficiently, ensuring that user concerns are addressed through established, impartial processes.

User Consent

By creating an account and using PhotexAI's services, users signify their agreement to these Terms & Conditions and acknowledge that they have read, understood, and accept the terms outlined herein. This consent includes adherence to all policies, guidelines, and any subsequent modifications that PhotexAI may implement. Users agree that their continued access and use of the platform constitutes binding acceptance of the terms, including any updates or changes communicated via the website or other official channels. By consenting, users commit to complying with all rules regarding platform conduct, content usage, and interactions with other users or third-party services. Furthermore, users understand that failure to comply with these terms may result in restricted access, suspension, or termination of their account. Users are encouraged to review these Terms periodically to stay informed about their responsibilities and any modifications that may affect their use of the platform. This proactive consent underscores the userâ€™s role in fostering a safe and legally compliant environment for all participants on the platform.

Governing Law

These Terms & Conditions, and any disputes or claims arising from their interpretation or use of the platform, shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the United States of America, without regard to conflict of law principles. This ensures that any legal questions involving PhotexAIâ€™s services will be handled under U.S. law, promoting consistency and predictability in legal proceedings.

Users agree that any legal actions related to these Terms will be brought exclusively in the federal or state courts specified by PhotexAI, which users accept as the appropriate venue. By agreeing to these Terms, users consent to the jurisdiction and judicial processes of U.S. courts, providing clarity and a legal framework for resolving any disputes.

Payment Terms

At present, PhotexAIâ€™s services are offered free of charge, with no payment plans or associated fees required for basic usage. Users can access and utilize the platformâ€™s features without incurring costs, fostering an inclusive environment that encourages creativity and participation. However, PhotexAI reserves the right to introduce payment plans, subscription models, or other fee-based services in the future as the platform evolves and expands its offerings.

If and when payment options are implemented, users will be notified in advance, and detailed information about pricing, billing cycles, and payment methods will be provided. Users will have the opportunity to review and agree to any new payment terms before subscribing to fee-based services. The introduction of paid features will be structured to maintain transparency, ensuring users understand any associated costs and can make informed decisions about their use of the platform.

Users who choose to engage in future paid services must comply with any updated payment terms, which may include policies related to refunds, cancellations, and billing disputes. PhotexAI will ensure that all payment processes are secure and compliant with industry standards, protecting user financial information and providing a reliable transactional experience.

Service Availability

PhotexAI is committed to providing reliable and continuous access to its services; however, users acknowledge that occasional service downtimes may occur due to planned maintenance, system updates, or unforeseen technical issues. In such instances, PhotexAI will make reasonable efforts to notify users in advance of planned maintenance or anticipated disruptions through email or other communication channels. For unexpected outages or technical difficulties that affect service availability, PhotexAI will communicate updates as promptly as possible, outlining the nature of the issue and any estimated resolution times. While PhotexAI strives to minimize disruptions and maintain optimal service performance, users agree that service interruptions may occur and that PhotexAI is not liable for any consequences resulting from these temporary unavailabilities.

Contact Us

If you have any questions, concerns, or feedback regarding this Usage Policy or the way our services are provided, we encourage you to reach out to us via email at press@photexai.com. Our dedicated team is committed to addressing your inquiries and ensuring that you receive clear and timely responses to any issues related to your use of the platform. At this time, email support is the primary method for contacting us, but we remain committed to maintaining open lines of communication to assist with your needs effectively.
